column4: How do I add "Desktop volume control"? It's not there any more and I don't know why or how to restore it. "System Settings > Startup Applications Preferences> [ x ] Show desktop volume control" does not help!
do you have the panel at top or bottom?
right click it -> add items to panel
why? what happens when u right click it
I only get options when I right click on icons
i am using the same version. ok on right clicking the icons there should be a option like add/remove panel items. is it there?
How do I reset my GNOME preferences?
unity does not give the option to remove or add the indicators directly i guess. u can use gnome extentions using gnome tweak or sumthng like that
